verbs.description: [ARG0: smithsonian museum] to [V: receive] [ARG1: matthew shepard collection] a collection of matthew shepard papers and personal objects will be donated to the smithsonian national museum of american history a news release from the smithsonian says the museum will accept the donation from shepard parents in washington on oct 25 the 21-year - old shepard died after being savagely beaten and left tied to a rail fence in october 1998 matthew shepard foundation matthew shepard museum matthew dennis shepard smithsonian museum smithsonian institution
